#summary Installing the scripts and patches

= Introduction =

Download the latest version of idvk.tar from the Downloads page.


= Details =

  # Create a new directory where you want to get and build Dalvik.
      `mkdir dvk`

  # Untar the archive into the directory
      `cd dvk'
      `tar xvf <path/to/idvk.tar>

  # Run the idvk script and follow the instructions
      `./idvk.sh`

= Get only Dalvik related code from GIT repositories =

  # Get Dalvik code and its dependencies
      `./idvk.sh get x86`

= Build =

  # Build code and its dependencies
      `./idvk.sh build x86`
